channel.title: Made webclient for you [Delta] [Detailed]
channel.description:
Web client link: http://www.rsps-client.tk This is a DeltaScape webclient. It will work for any delta base source. Picture: [IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l359/k0ala21/deltawebclient.png[/img]
Custom items on client: Armadyl Godsword - Item ID = 35 Bandos Godsword - Item ID = 667 Zamorak Godsword - Item ID = 746 Bandos Tassets - Item ID = 2402 Bandos Chestplate - Item ID = 1077 Dragon Boots - Item ID = 2904 Dragon Claws - Item ID = 8002 Elysian Spirit Shield - Item ID = 9003 Dragon Platebody - Item ID = 13665 Bandos Boots - Item ID = 15350
Add this to your Item.cfg: [code] item = 35 Armadyl_Godsword This_used_to_belong_to_King_Arthur. 300000000 300000000 300000000 100 160 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 200 8 item = 667 Bandos_Godsword A_Faladian_Knight's_sword. 300000000 300000000 300000000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8 item = 746 Zamorak_godsword A_black_obsidian_dagger,_it_has_a_strange_aura_about_it. 300000000 300000000 300000000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8 item = 2402 Saradomin_godsword The_magical_sword_'Silverlight'. 300000000 300000000 300000000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8 item = 1077 Bandos_tassets Big,_black_and_heavy_looking. 187000000 187000000 187000000 0 0 0 -21 -7 71 63 66 -4 93 2 1 item = 1107 Bandos_chestplate A_series_of_connected_metal_rings. 187000000 187000000 187000000 0 0 0 -15 -10 98 93 105 -6 133 4 item = 2904 Dragon_Boots Very_stylish! 10000000.961576069808 10000000.961576069808 10000000.03290933615 0 0 0 -3 -1 16 17 18 0 0 4 0 item = 8002 Dragon_Claws Dragon_Claws 250000000 250000000 0 70 70 70 70 70 70 17 10 10 10 120 2 item = 9003 Elysian_Spirit_Shield It's a spirit shield. 150000000 150000000 150000000 0 0 0 0 0 63 65 75 2 57 0 3 item = 13665 Dragon_Platebody Dragon_Platebody 900000000 900000000 900000000 0 0 0 -30 0 109 107 97 -6 106 0 0 item = 15350 Bandos boots A silabsoft Item 1000000 1000000 1000000 5 5 5 5 5 10 10 10 10 10 3 2 [/code]

item.description:
@irlegitir wrote:

Web client link: http://www.rsps-client.tk
This is a DeltaScape webclient. It will work for any delta base source.
Picture:

deltawebclient.png754Ã—494

item = 35	Armadyl_Godsword	This_used_to_belong_to_King_Arthur.	300000000	300000000	300000000	100	160	80	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	200	8
